translations.translation: He added, 'What is your business, messengers?'
And asked them: "What matter, O angels, brings you here?"
He added: "What is your errand O sent ones?"
He said, “And what is your next task, O the sent angels?”
He said: "What then is the business for which you have come, O messengers"
He said: What is your business then, O apostles?
He said, 'And what is your business, envoys?'
He said: And afterward what is your business, O ye messengers (of Allah)?
Then he asked, "What then is your business, O messengers?"
He said: what is your errand, sent ones?
He said, ‘O messengers, what is now your errand?’
Abraham said: "What then is the business on which ye (have come), O ye messengers (of Allah)?"
[Ibrahim (Abraham) again] said: "What then is the business on which you have come, O Messengers?"
He asked: 'Messengers, what is your errand'
He said, “So what is your business, O envoys?”
[Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
[15:57] He said, ‘So what is your business, O you who have been sent [by God]?’
(He said) Abraham said to Gabriel and his aids: (And afterward what is your business) what is the matter, why did you come, you messengers (of Allah)?)

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثمَّ لما جرى بينهم ما جرى { قَالَ } ابراهيم عليه السلام على مقتضى نفوسه منهم: { فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ } أي: أمركم العظيم الذي جئتم لأجله { أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ } [الحجر: 57] المهيبون؟

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ قال فما خَطْبُكم أيها المرسلون } أي: ما شانكم الذي أرسلتم لأجله سوى البشارة؟ ولعله علم ان كمال المقصود ليس هو البشارة فقط، لأنهم كانوا عدداً، والبشارة لا تحتاج إلى عدد، ولذلك اكتفى بالواحد في بشارة زكريا ومريم
 أو لأنهم بشروه في تضاعيف الحال لأزالة الوجل، ولو كانت تمام المقصود لابتدروه بها
